ai-mil6.1.7:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, anyone here who committed an offense entailing expulsion wouldn’t have committed an offense entailing expulsion. But after some time they wouldn’t confess an offense entailing expulsion, but not others who have committed an offense entailing expulsion.”
ai-mil6.1.7:1.5_0: “He is the cause, his condition for the settlements that have been cut off, and is unbroken.”
ai-mil6.1.7:2.1_0: “Venerable Sir, you’re not to say to you,
ai-mil6.1.7:2.2_0: ‘Since there is no anxious, there is the reason why the mind is being anxious, there is no inconvenient in them.’
ai-mil6.1.7:2.3_0: And when he does not know a question with unless the mind, his body and mind aren’t eager, confident, settled, and decided about the teachings, he thinks: ‘In this way, what way do you become a question?’
ai-mil6.1.7:3.1_0: “Great king, this ploughshare, that’s easily plenty of seeds that were in training.”
ai-mil6.1.7:3.3_0: “Great king, would you plant seed the seed sown in the sky?”
ai-mil6.1.7:3.5_0: “But great king, why is it that the seed sown in the root of the seed?”
ai-mil6.1.7:3.6_0: “Sir, there’s no propagation for the sake of seed, for the sake of the propagation, not for the sake of seeds.”
ai-mil6.1.7:3.7_0: “In the same way, great king, there are things that are the cause, and the reason why these things aren’t been cut off.
ai-mil6.1.7:4.1_0: But if they do throw stones on the earth, stones, sticks, and swords strike it with their fists, stones, sticks, and swords, with their fists, I say.”
ai-mil6.1.7:4.3_0: “But great king, what reason do you use to hit a stone with a stick?”
ai-mil6.1.7:4.4_0: “Sir, there is no stones in the air by the fingers and founders.”
ai-mil6.1.7:4.5_0: “In the same way, great king, by that hate is the cause of defects, eradication, and oppressiveness of deeds, but only when that.
ai-mil6.1.7:5.1_0: A fire, great king, if burns in water, were to burntcles water?”
ai-mil6.1.7:5.3_0: “But great king, what reason does that you just burn with what reason?”
ai-mil6.1.7:5.4_0: “Sir, there’s no reason for a fire to burn with water.”
ai-mil6.1.7:5.5_0: “In the same way, great king, by that hate is the cause of defilement and concepts when it comes to the uprooting of these things are abolished.”
ai-mil6.1.7:6.1_0: “Venerable sir, when one thinks I haven’t thought about that.” And when they don’t know me by reference to such a kind of thought, he respondsing another.
ai-mil6.1.7:6.2_0: “Great king, isn’t worth a sixteenth part of life if it’s been carried away by for you to take my life?”
ai-mil6.1.7:6.4_0: “In the same way, great king, has done bad things by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-mil6.1.7:7.1_0: Would there be no fire if you don’t transgress in a fire?”
ai-mil6.1.7:7.3_0: “In the same way, great king, has done bad things by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-mil6.1.7:8.1_0: Would that one not know that he is taken away life?”
ai-mil6.1.7:8.3_0: “In the same way, great king, has done bad things by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-mil6.1.7:9.1_0: Doesn’t you have any treasure of the ascetics who follow the seven classes of elephants, horses, observed the elephants, horses, and chariots, or the definites of the treasures?”
ai-mil6.1.7:9.2_0: “Sir, Nāgita isn’t able to make the proclamation of Sakka. I accept it.”
ai-mil6.1.7:10.1_0: The seventh enquiry is the seventh section.
